title: "Birdman" is a darkly comic meditation on fame and ego
summary: One of the central themes of "Birdman" is the search for authenticity in his work, relationships and his life as a whole. Ego is one of the main things that drives Riggan throughout the film. Fame can bring happiness in the short term, but it isn’t something that lasts, especially in the long term. It can also be detrimental to one’s creativity, as fame can create a fear of failure that stifles the creative process. Being famous is not a prerequisite for living a happy and fulfilling life, as it can lead to envy, isolation and privacy.

The world around us is obsessed with the lives of celebrities and their glamorous lifestyles, so it\u2019s easy to view fame as the ultimate goal."),mdx("p",null,"The problem with this is that fame is a fleeting thing. While it can bring happiness in the short term, it\u2019s usually followed by a feeling of emptiness. There are only a few people in the world who can truly say that they have found true happiness through fame."),mdx("p",null,"Being famous is not a prerequisite for living a happy and fulfilling life. In fact, it can even be harmful as it can lead to envy, isolation and a lack of privacy. It can also be detrimental to one\u2019s creativity, as fame can create a fear of failure that stifles the creative process."),mdx("h2",null,"The Search for Authenticity and Self-Discovery"),mdx("p",null,'One of the central themes of "Birdman" is the search for authenticity. Riggan, who is the protagonist of the story, is trying to find authenticity in his work, his relationships and his life as a whole. Coming from a past of soap opera acting, Broadway and being the superhero Birdman, Riggan is trying to find authenticity in all aspects of himself. He\u2019s trying to find out what he really wants to do in his life, which is directing and writing.'),mdx("p",null,"In terms of relationships, we see that he\u2019s trying to find authenticity with his daughter, Sam, and his ex-wife, Sylvia. He\u2019s trying to get his daughter to like him and have a relationship with her. He\u2019s also trying to get back together with his ex-wife, who is the mother of his daughter. This is all because he wants to find authenticity in his life."),mdx("h2",null,"Ego and Fear"),mdx("p",null,'Another common theme in "Birdman" is the ego and fear. Ego is one of the main things that drives Riggan throughout the film. He has an ego that is so strong that he\u2019s a Broadway actor, writes and directs his own play and tries to start a new career as a Hollywood actor. He also has a very extreme case of imposter syndrome, which is caused by a lack of self-confidence, which is very much seen in the film.'),mdx("p",null,"Fear is another common theme in the film. Riggan is afraid of failing at everything. He is afraid of failing at his Broadway show, being a Hollywood actor, getting back together with his ex-wife, getting along with his daughter, and being rejected by the public. He is so full of fear that he is unable to function normally in life, and this leads him to do some very irrational things."),mdx("h2",null,"Money, Fame and Happiness"),mdx("p",null,"Money and fame can be considered two of the three things that make people happy. While money can buy happiness in the short term, it\u2019s fleeting, and it doesn\u2019t last. Fame can also bring happiness in the short term, but it isn\u2019t something that lasts, especially in the long term."),mdx("p",null,"The one thing that will make people happy above all else is finding a passion in life and doing something that they love. Passion can\u2019t be bought, and it can lead to a long-lasting happiness. It can also lead to fame, but it\u2019s a much better option than pursuing fame in itself."),mdx("h2",null,"How to Deal With Our Egos"),mdx("p",null,"The first step in dealing with a strong ego is recognizing that it exists. It\u2019s important to recognize when the ego is causing you to make irrational decisions, and it\u2019s also important to recognize when your ego is helping you to be confident and successful. The next step is to be aware of when your ego is causing problems, and try to correct those issues."),mdx("p",null,"Finally, it\u2019s important to surround yourself with people who challenge your ego, as this can help you to overcome your insecurities. While it\u2019s important to have confidence in yourself, it\u2019s also important to be humble. The best way to deal with a strong ego is to keep it in check, and be grateful for all the good things that have come your way."),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"This film poses an interesting question about what it means to be famous, and whether it really brings happiness. It also explores the importance of being authentic and finding your passion, and the dangers of ego. With this in mind, it\u2019s important to stay grounded and keep your ego in check to avoid falling prey to unhealthy obsession with fame."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

However, that doesn\u2019t mean there hasn\u2019t been some brilliant albums released so far this year. While last year had some incredible albums (like Kendrick Lamar\u2019s \u201CDamn,\u201D Lorde\u2019s \u201CMelodrama,\u201D and Noel Gallagher\u2019s High Flying Birds' "Who Built the Moon?"), this year hasn\u2019t quite matched up to those standards. However, we are only halfway through the year and as such, we have also seen some fantastic new albums released in the last few months that are worth mentioning. There may not be many great new albums out at the moment \u2013 but these five are definitely among the best.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

It has proven to be a way for people from different cultures and backgrounds to come together and express themselves. From its humble beginnings in New York City, hip hop has grown into a worldwide sensation, with local scenes spawning in cities across the globe. This article explores the history of hip-hop music, from its roots as an underground movement in the early 1980s to its predominance as one of the most popular genres today.
Fans of rap music are undoubtedly aware that this style of music has origins in New York City during the 1970s and 1980s, but there is much more to know about how exactly it came about and how it evolved over time. From breakdancing to rapping, we\u2019ll explore all of the elements that blended together to form what we now call \u201Chip-hop\u201D today.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

Released on August 31, 2018, it\u2019s also the band\u2019s final record with their original label Atlantic Records. After two decades in the music business, Death Cab for Cutie have developed into one of the most beloved bands in indie rock.
After their last album, Codes and Keys (2012), frontman Ben Gibbard announced that he was working on a solo project called The New Age. It was something he had been thinking about for some time but wasn\u2019t sure when or if it would come to fruition. Fortunately, after meeting with producer Rich Costey (M83, Blond Redhead) who helped him record some demos, things fell into place. The album came out as a collaborative release between Ben Gibbard and Nathan Wiley under the name The Further Adventures of New Age. And three years later Death Cab For Cutie released Thank You For Today.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

Its tagline is \u201CThere\u2019s a sucker born every minute. But they don\u2019t grow up thinking they can be con men. They get taught to be one.\u201D And its trailer goes on to say, \u201CThe housing bubble was about to burst\u2026 And a group of misfits saw it coming. Now these unlikely heroes must band together and bring down the greedy villains who crashed the world economy\u2026 Before anyone else gets hurt.\u201D
Unfortunately, that last part is not hyperbole. The actions of unscrupulous financial engineers \u2014 colloquially known as \u201Cbankers\u201D \u2014 led directly to the Great Recession in 2008, which cost millions their jobs and homes, while triggering widespread deflation and anemic growth throughout much of the developed world for years thereafter.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
